title: Advanced Language Learning Design Using MOOCs: Comparative Analysis of Teacher-Centered vs. Active Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher foreign language proficiency and basic ability to use digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners, acting as general citizens with advanced expertise in a language domain, engage in blended learning within a digital device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Learners explain differences between teacher-centered and active learning pedagogies with ≥80% accuracy when designing MOOCs
Learners design and demonstrate three blended MOOC contents tailored to target learners (aged 40+)
Learners measure learning effectiveness with ≥70% accuracy using summative assessment tools when evaluating language-domain MOOCs
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
